name: Crypto Bollinger-RSI Mean Reversion
description: Daily mean-reversion strategy for BTC/USD and ETH/USD that combines Bollinger Bands (20, 2σ) with RSI(14). Enters long when price closes below the lower band and RSI<30; enters short when price closes above the upper band and RSI>70. Exits at the Bollinger mid-line or first stop/target hit. Uses 2 % fixed-fraction capital at risk, 1.5 % trailing stop equivalent via fixed offset, and 3 % take-profit. Designed for 24/7 crypto markets with moderate risk profile.
